law.catch_line: Reports of fire calls by fire departments -- Monthly summaries to be sent to commissioner.

text.section: Each fire department operating within the Commonwealth, whether paid or volunteer, shall file a monthly summary of the reports required to be completed in subsection (1) of this section with the commission's office. The commission shall transmit a copy of each fire department's monthly summary to the commissioner. Monthly summaries shall be made on a form, similar to the National Fire Protection Association's fire reporting action summary form, to be distributed by the commission.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1144, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 170, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2008. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 224, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1982.
